flawed_nl_solution:
Viviana has 25+5 = <<25+5=30>>30 chocolate chips.
Susana has 3/4*20 = <<3/4*20=80/3>>80/3 Vanilla chips.
They have 30+25 = <<30+25=55>>55 chocolate chips together.
Together they have 20+80/3 = <<20+80/3=140/3>>140/3 vanilla chips.
Together they have 140/3+55 = <<140/3+55=305/3>>305/3 chips
#### 305/3

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 15, not 80/3. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
